snippet: Police in the port city of Karachi opened a case against a Christian teenager, Ryan Stanten, after a mob ransacked his home over a rumor that he had sent blasphemous messages.

byline.contributor: Zia ur-Rehman contributed reporting from Karachi, Pakistan.

lead_paragraph: Police in the port city of Karachi opened a case against a Christian teenager, Ryan Stanten, after a mob ransacked his home over a rumor that he had sent blasphemous messages.

headline.seo: Pakistani in Hiding After Blasphemy Claim, Police Say
headline.main: Pakistani Teenager in Hiding After Blasphemy Accusation, Police Say
headline.print_headline: Pakistani Teenager in Hiding After Blasphemy Accusation, Police Say
